title: Samsung website
description: I maintain and update Samsung.com/hk with my senior frontend developer. Make sure Hong Kong version is match of global or other area version, and no any bug for the Samsung.com website. We will using basic Html, CSS and Javascript, and check different area version makesure the user expereice is the best. Sometime, we will add some litte functions and some changes for our Hong Kong version.

title: Central Markert
description: This website is description a New Central Market. Central Market was rebuilded by government, also, this website was builded. I using modern framework - React.js and different library, this can easily to develop and maintain frontend part, also, I have make different text and some css animation in this website.

title: Samsung Clubs Website
description: These websites are about registration different Samsung's models to get offers and S dollars. User can register samsung models and get some highly quality offers and S dollars, I make sure the clients and users can fastily and easily finished registration in these websites, so I quickly develop and maintain Frontend part of different models's clubs registration websites, (Including S22 / Tabs8 / Flip3 / Fold3 / Watch4 / Buds2 / Book2).

title: Website Rebranding
summary: Maintenance / Enhance Search Rank / Web Rebranding
description: This project is Kontec's website rebranding. I develop and build a highly quality website. In order to development, maintenance and enhance search rank. This project easily build components, and high rank SEO website through Next.js framework. Clients easily see or search different project through category component.

title: Cosmetic's website event
description: This project is Kontec's vender project, this project have 3 versions at 3 month period. Thus, I make components and some through React.js, that I can easily and fast to setup and maintain anything. I develop and build a responsive website, and help cosmetic's company to set up responsive website in cosmetic's website throguh iframe.

title: Bybit Future dashboard
summary: Recording your Future's profit and loss
description: This mini future dashboard is getting Bybit API and you can record your total's realised & unrealised profit & loss and today's profit and loss.

title: Bug Man
summary: 正因為每個人都是不完美，造就每一個獨一無二的人。
summary2: Because everyone is different, bring up unique everyone.
description:
This is my Final year project, through UnityC# engine, I laerning design pattern and C# in this project.
Bug-Man is a single-player top-down shooter 2d video game, which style is cute and retro pixel art. The player will act as the 'Bug-Man' character in the laboratory who has some special skills and some negative abilities through the different mystical pills. Moreover, the different pills have different gameplay, and each time just can use a pill ability in a game-level scene. In the battle process, the player will battle with enemies through special skills and weapons. Also, Bug-Man is not just a shooter game, which has the puzzle game area in the game-level scene, Bug-man game encourages player thinking and learning in the puzzle part. In the final area of the game-level scene, the player will battle with the strong and smart final boss, according to the final boss's health, the final boss has different attack patterns in the battle process.

title: The Cude
description:
The cube is a 3d puzzle game, and develop at UnityC# engine. In this project I mainly learning OOP and build a lot of components for the puzzle scenes and some animations.
Player control 2 cube character, through switch character and trigger different mechanism to finish the puzzle game. Furthermore, I want to make a 3d puzzle game, and this 3d puzzle game about story of cuber.
The story about 2 of cubers have lively and their will help each other, through different funny and beauty puzzle game, their will find other lively cubers in the final area. Through blender software the cube character 3d model built by Me. I make cuber of cube character look like have lively.

title: Camera Event
summary: Take a photo and save it
description: This project is kontec interactive project. Build 're-use' conponents in UnityC# engine, that can reduce develop time. Interactive camera X-Mas event, users can take a photo with cartoon character. After a second, the photo will upload to server, also the server will return the link and generate the qr code at the display monitor. Lastly Users can screen qr code and download the photo.

title: Is it Sun?
summary: It is a sun or not?
description:
'Is_It_Sun' artwork, I using coding of 'Processing' to make artwork. Some one will think this is sun, some one is not think it. That depend on the audience how to understand my artwork.
Moreover, it have deep meaning in sun artwork, Michel Foucault (He is a philosopher) talking 'Discontinuity', and Foucault's suggest people focus on the 'Discontinuity' while not mainly focus 'Continuity' in the history. And I am agree his point, I want to talking my thinking through this sun artwork. The real sun maybe is not a sun, our real world is not real, like of the Foucault's 'Discontinuity' and 'Continuity', 'Continuity' 's history maybe not a real history, also we maybe need to find a real history in the 'Discontinuity'.
In the behind meaning, 'Discontinuity' represent a series of coding, and 'Continuity' represent 'sun'. Finally, I want to explain 'Is_It_Sun' artwork through Foucault's theory. Our eyes see this sun (world) maybe not a real, maybe just a series numbers, maybe we need to find 'real world' in this 'world'.
